
New Jersey Family magazine compiled a list of 
["New Jersey's Best Towns for Families 2019"](https://www.njfamily.com/new-jerseys-best-towns-for-families-the-list-2019/).
Let's see how these top ranked towns stack up in terms of population density
and racial diversity, features that matter a lot to myself and I'll bet at least
one other NJ Millennial.

```{r}
dive_dens %>%
  select(-c(`pct Two or more`, `pct Native American`, 
            `pct Pacific Islander`, `Square miles`)) %>%
  DT::datatable(rownames = NULL) %>%
  DT::formatRound(columns = c(5, 10), digits = 0, mark = ',') %>%
  DT::formatPercentage(columns = c(4, 11:ncol(dive_dens)), digits = 1) %>%
  DT::formatPercentage(columns = c(8, 9), digits = 0)
```
